timeline.message:
fix more error prone issues

- mark unused variable in jsontemplates
- rename conflicting type: Type
upgrade nullaway, minor comment block rename

timeline.bodyText: Too bad, this is a public API class and the Type is exposed as public. We need @depraecated and a CHANGELOG update?
timeline.author: chanseokoh

replies.bodyText: You know what, I didn't even realize this was api. Lemme go reverse this and just use fqn for asm.
replies.author: loosebazooka

timeline.bodyText: I wonder if it is possible to configure errorpone to exclude classes of type JsonTemplate. But I'm not sure which one is better in the end even if it's possible
timeline.author: chanseokoh

replies.bodyText: Hrmm.. I'm thinking being more explicit about it means we did it intentionally, rather than wholesale.
replies.author: loosebazooka

timeline.message: Category back to Type, use fqn for asm
